Dgame.Math.Rect



struct Rect(T) if (isNumeric!(T));
version = Develop;

Rect defines a rectangle structure that contains the left upper corner and the width/height.

Author:
rschuett

T x;
The x and y coordinates

T y;
The x and y coordinates

T width;
The width and the height

T height;
The width and the height

this(T x, T y, T width, T height);
CTor

this(int x, int y, int width, int height);
CTor

this(ref const Vector2!(T) vec, T width, T height);
CTor

void opAssign(U : T)(ref const Rect!(U) rhs);
opAssign

const Rect!(T) opBinary(string op, U)(ref const Rect!(U) rect);
Supported operations: +=

void collapse();
Collapse this Rect. Means that the coordinates and the size is set to 0.

const bool isEmpty();
Checks if this Rect is empty (if it's collapsed).

const Rect!(T) getUnion(U)(ref const Rect!(U) rect);
Returns an union of the given and this Rect.

const bool contains(U)(ref const Vector2!(U) vec);
Checks whether this Rect contains the given coordinates.

const bool contains(U)(U x, U y);
Checks whether this Rect contains the given coordinates.

const bool opEquals(U)(ref const Rect!(U) rect);
opEquals:
compares two rectangles on their coordinates and their size (but not explicit type).

const Rect!(U) opCast(V : Rect!(U), U)();
opCast to another Rect type.

const bool opCast(U = bool)();
opCast for bool

const bool intersects(U)(ref const Rect!(U) rect, ShortRect* intersection = null);
Checks whether this Rect intersects with an other. If, and the parameter 'intersection' isn't null, the colliding rectangle is stored there.

inout inout(SDL_Rect)* ptr();
Returns a pointer to an SDL_Rect.

void setSize(U)(U width, U height);
Replace current size.

void increase(U)(U width, U height);
Increase current size.

void setPosition(U)(ref const Vector2!(U) position);
Set a new position vector.

void setPosition(U)(U x, U y);
Set a new position with coordinates.

const Vector2!(T) getPosition();
Returns the current position.

void move(U)(ref const Vector2!(U) vec);
Move the object.

void move(U)(U x, U y);
Move the object.

void set(U, V)(U x, U y, V w, V h);
The new coordinates and a new size.

alias FloatRect = Rect!(float).Rect;
alias for float

alias ShortRect = Rect!(short).Rect;
alias for short
